title: Hour 2: Give Me Liquid Death
description:
After a NFL discussion including Jim Irsay, Robert Kraft, and Jerry Jones, we dive into LeBron James fit with this Los Angeles Lakers roster and their lack of shooters. Then, why do NBA players like Kevin Durant and Russell Westbrook prefer to listen to negative media comments as opposed to the positive? Plus, a deep dive into all the different types of water marketed to the American public and why we're dumb enough to buy them.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
